localize.description: Studyum是一个适用于任何金融科技产品的自定义3D图标包。使用这些手工制作的图标创建令人惊叹的独特项目，在Figma中轻松编辑，并在Cinema 4D中完全自定义。3D图标震撼人心!

nodes.excerpt: Lack of communication channels on websites results in customer churn, low satisfaction rate and minimal to zero customer success. LiveCaller solves those issues by offering all in one solution, that combines Web Call, Web Chat, Callback, Social Messaging Apps
nodes.title: LiveCaller - Free web call with online chat, omni channel and co-browsing
nodes.author: Tanjum 🔥

localize.description: 网站缺乏沟通渠道，导致客户流失，满意度低，客户成功率极低甚至为零。LiveCaller通过提供所有的解决方案来解决这些问题，它结合了网络呼叫，网络聊天，回电，社交信息应用。
localize.tagline: 免费网络通话，在线聊天，全频道和共同浏览。

localize.description: 網站缺乏溝通渠道，導致客戶流失，滿意度低，客戶成功率極低甚至爲零。LiveCaller通過提供所有的解決方案來解決這些問題，它結合了網絡呼叫，網絡聊天，回電，社交信息應用。
localize.tagline: 免費網絡通話，在線聊天，全頻道和共同瀏覽。

nodes.excerpt: Can’t remember where you saved your Bank Account Number? Need quick access to your CV or the digital copy of your Passport? That’s why we created Clipboard PRO: the easiest way to find, copy and paste all your information with a tap!

localize.description: 不记得自己的银行账号保存在哪里了？需要快速访问您的简历或护照的电子版？这就是为什么我们创造了剪贴板专业版：最简单的方式来查找、复制和粘贴您的所有信息，只需轻点一下。
localize.tagline: 快速访问所有您最常用的内容

nodes.excerpt: Tuti.study is a webapp that helps teachers and students to improve the way they learn online. You can create beautiful annonated presentations, create, save, share your online flashcards with students, friends and colleagues by sharing a link.

nodes.excerpt: omniquotient is an assessment tool that helps you learn if you are using the tech community's recommended practices in programming, and if not, it shows you how you can improve the way you code.

nodes.excerpt: Clockk is a FREE AI-powered time tracking tool for digital agencies and freelancers. See what you worked on, when, by project. No more time sheet pain! Perfect for software devs, graphic designers, digital marketers, and anyone else who bills time. 🔥💰🚀

localize.description: Clockk是一款免费的人工智能时间追踪工具，适用于数字机构和自由职业者。按项目查看您的工作内容、时间。不再有时间表的痛苦 非常适合软件开发人员、平面设计师、数字营销人员以及其他任何需要记录时间的人。🔥💰🚀

nodes.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to search for a remote job without getting tracked, being forced to sign in, having your resume crawled, or experiencing "location bias"? Ever felt like your job search has been at the expense of your privacy? We have. And we're fixing it.
nodes.title: Remote Hill - Privacy-centric, international, remote-only job board
nodes.author: Nathan Clark

localize.description: 你是否曾经想找一份远程工作，而不被跟踪、不被强制登录、不被抓取简历、不遭遇 "位置偏见"？有没有觉得自己的求职是以牺牲自己的隐私为代价的？我们有。而且我们正在解决这个问题。
localize.tagline: 以隐私为中心的国际远程招聘网站。

localize.tagline: 以隱私爲中心的國際遠程招聘網站。

Each box is curated for your dietary needs. Vegan? GF, low carb? No problem. Find your perfect https://tastermonial.com/pages/tasterbox-quiz

nodes.excerpt: Getting the perfect name for your startup is obviously important. In fact, it's the first thing people notice when visiting our brand. But... it's a pain to find a great name/domain that's available. Now, it's time to forget that pain because we're here to help you.

nodes.excerpt: Your same bank account, but without the annoying fees. Enjoy fee-free banking with your current account, no need to switch banks or open new accounts. Waiver blocks overdraft, maintenance and late credit card fees.
nodes.title: Waiver - Block overdraft, maintenance and credit card late fees

nodes.excerpt: Without Community, There Is No Crypto. LunarCRUSH is a social listening platform for cryptocurrencies and helps investors make better decisions by tracking the community each cryptocurrency is building through beautiful dashboards and real-time data analysis.
nodes.title: LunarCRUSH - Social Listening for Cryptocurrencies

localize.description: 没有社区，就没有加密。LunarCRUSH是一个加密货币的社交聆听平台，通过精美的仪表盘和实时数据分析，跟踪每个加密货币正在建立的社区，帮助投资者做出更好的决策。

localize.description: 沒有社區，就沒有加密。LunarCRUSH是一個加密貨幣的社交聆聽平臺，通過精美的儀表盤和實時數據分析，跟蹤每個加密貨幣正在建立的社區，幫助投資者做出更好的決策。

nodes.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.

nodes.excerpt: 💸 Z1 is a digital bank for teenagers in LatAm, where they can spend and receive money through a prepaid Mastercard credit card. Z1 gives teenagers autonomy and teaches them financial literacy from their first contact with money all throughout their adulthood✨

localize.description: 💸 Z1是拉丁美洲青少年的数字银行，他们可以通过预付万事达卡信用卡消费和收款。Z1给予青少年自主权，并教会他们从第一次接触金钱到整个成年后的金融知识✨。

nodes.excerpt: Salad is the easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC. Our users (or “Chefs”) turn a wealth of idle compute resources into epic loot—including Steam games, digital subscriptions, in-game loot, gift cards, and more.

nodes.excerpt: Being the first 2-in-1 system for managing dog poop, PooPail makes life easier by scooping waste directly into the pail, then conveniently storing it for up to a week within its compostable and biodegradable bags.
nodes.title: PooPail - The easy 2-in-1 solution to cleaning dog poop
nodes.author: Norayr Margarian

localize.description: 作为第一个2合1的狗便便管理系统，PooPail让生活变得更简单，直接将废物舀入桶中，然后在其可堆肥和生物降解袋中方便地存储一周。
localize.tagline: 简单的2合1清洁狗粪的解决方案。

localize.description: 作爲第一個2合1的狗便便管理系統，PooPail讓生活變得更簡單，直接將廢物舀入桶中，然後在其可堆肥和生物降解袋中方便地存儲一週。
localize.tagline: 簡單的2合1清潔狗糞的解決方案。

nodes.excerpt: The fastest way to make a tailored cover letter. Create a resume, target a job description, and instantly generate a matching cover letter.
nodes.title: AI Cover Letter - Generate a tailored cover letter based on your resume
nodes.author: Jacob Jacquet

localize.description: 最快的方法，让你量身定做求职信。创建一份简历，锁定一个职位描述，并立即生成一封匹配的求职信。
localize.tagline: 根据你的简历生成一封量身定做的求职信。

localize.description: 最快的方法，讓你量身定做求職信。創建一份簡歷，鎖定一個職位描述，並立即生成一封匹配的求職信。
localize.tagline: 根據你的簡歷生成一封量身定做的求職信。

nodes.excerpt: MarketPlan's new Video & Image Collaboration feature allows you and your marketing team or clients to upload, collaborate, comment, on your marketing assets with a simple click and drag. localize.description: MarketPlan新的視頻和圖片協作功能允許您和您的營銷團隊或客戶通過簡單的點擊和拖動來上傳、協作、評論您的營銷資產。本週我們還在網站上開通了https://marketplan.io/?ref=producthunt&utm_source=Product%20Hunt&utm_campaign=Product%20Hunt%20Image%20Video%20Collaboration%20Launch&utm_medium=Post&utm_content=Post%20Description%20Link。

nodes.excerpt: The Crown guides you into a focused state and helps you stay there. It aligns your brainwaves in the right patterns for your optimal flow. Discover the songs that expedite your flow and help you find the zone using the Neurosity app with your Spotify account.
nodes.title: Crown™ - Shift into focus
nodes.author: Alex Castillo

localize.description: 皇冠引导你进入专注状态，并帮助你保持这种状态。它以正确的模式调整您的脑电波，以达到最佳流程。使用带有Spotify账户的Neurosity应用程序，发现能够加快您的流动并帮助您找到区域的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 转入焦点

localize.description: 皇冠引導你進入專注狀態，並幫助你保持這種狀態。它以正確的模式調整您的腦電波，以達到最佳流程。使用帶有Spotify賬戶的Neurosity應用程序，發現能夠加快您的流動並幫助您找到區域的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 轉入焦點
